LanguageData.MDR_ComplexityDirectiveDesc: How much complexity this directive adds to the overall total.
LanguageData.MDR_ComplexityEffectsDesc: The current effect the complexity will have on the pawn.
LanguageData.MDR_ComplexityLimitExceeded: The {0} complexity limit has been exceeded with {1} total complexity. This will have severe adverse effects!
LanguageData.MDR_BaselineComplexityDesc: How much complexity this unit is able to handle without exceeding standard operating limits or without complexity offsetting.
